metadata.name: The Last Monk  "Raya"
metadata.description: The last monk "Raya" the protector of the sacred saruka tree and the only preacher in the flower clan of itsuki tribe. Once in every three years raya climbs at the top of the tallest mountain where the sakura tree lies with the hidden secrets of flower clan, it is said that only one person knows the exact location of the tree and the place defies the reality known to humans, this knowledge is passed down from "Trapa"  to "Trapa" (Trapa - student). Raya is the youngest and is the  last monk in the monestry of flower clan.
